article.title: U.S. Navy Procures Oracle Enterprise License
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: DLT Solutions, Herndon, Va., is being awarded an $8,772,000 firm-fixed-price blanket purchase agreement for the Department of the Navy (DON) Oracle enterprise license agreement to provide DON personnel license for use and maintenance of a wide variety of Oracle software products. This contract includes six options, which if exercised, would bring the total amount of the contract to $227 million over five years. The Naval Supply Systems Command Weapon Systems Support, Mechanicsburg, Pa., is the contracting activity.
